cells.data:
June 24th, 2016
Have just completed new background structure for game working similar to foreground obstacles, except there is not interation between player and background objects (only for interest and decoration).

One major change is that at end of level, instead of trying to synchronize the position of the last background object and the gate. I determine gate closest to end of level and move the gate a certain distance from the last background object. May need to change the way the foreground obstacles are drawn due to this in the future.
